bibl.title: Coinage in Roman Egypt. The Hoard Evidence.
bibl.note: The hoard evidence from Roman Egypt and the use of coins (30 BC-AD 296). - I. The Evidence of Coin Hoards. - II. Currency in Roman Egypt. - III. The Hoards of Tetradrachms: Karanis. - IV. Other Hoards of Tetradrachms. - V. Nero and a Stable Currency. - VI. Commodus and a Dormant Crisis? - VII. Gallienus and Aurelian. - VIII. Probus and the Tetrarchy. - IX. From Corrosion to Clarity. - Bibliography. Index.
CHRISTIANSEN Erik, Coinage in Roman Egypt. The Hoard Evidence.
Aarhus, Aarhus University Press, 2004, 8Â°, 208 pp., 9 tabl., 18 figg., 3 pll. ISBN 87-7288-964-0. 180 cour. dan.
